languages.text:
Выберите действие атаки на панели внизу экрана, которым хотите атаковать вражеский корабль, а затем кликните на нем [ЛКМ]. В каждом ходу вы можете использовать все атаки корабля по одному разу.
Во время боя используйте маневры перемещений и атаки разных орудий, чтобы эффективно использовать возможности корабля.

Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.
languages.original_text:
Выберите действие атаки на панели внизу экрана, которым хотите атаковать вражеский корабль, а затем кликните на нем [ЛКМ]. В каждом ходу вы можете использовать все атаки корабля по одному разу.
Во время боя используйте маневры перемещений и атаки разных орудий, чтобы эффективно использовать возможности корабля.

traits.locale_text:
Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each turn, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

languages.text:
您可以在屏幕底部的面板上选择攻击工作，之后鼠标左键点击目标舰船。每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，每种攻击都可以使用一次。
您需要在战斗中操纵舰船，使用各种各样的武器进行攻击，充分发挥舰船的火力。
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
您可以在屏幕底部的面板上选择攻击工作，之后鼠标左键点击目标舰船。每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，每种攻击都可以使用一次。
您需要在战斗中操纵舰船，使用各种各样的武器进行攻击，充分发挥舰船的火力。

languages.text:
画面下のパネルで敵を攻撃するアクションを選択し、敵の船の上で [LMB] をクリックしよう。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに、船の攻撃をそれぞれ使用できる。
戦闘中に船を操作し、さまざまな武器で攻撃して、船の能力を最大限に活用しよう。
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
画面下のパネルで敵を攻撃するアクションを選択し、敵の船の上で [LMB] をクリックしよう。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに、船の攻撃をそれぞれ使用できる。
戦闘中に船を操作し、さまざまな武器で攻撃して、船の能力を最大限に活用しよう。

languages.text:
Selecciona una acción de ataque desde el panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla para atacar a un enemigo y pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre una nave enemiga. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} puedes usar todos los ataques de la nave una vez.
Maniobra tu nave en combate y ataca con las diferentes armas para aprovechar al máximo las capacidades de tu nave.
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
Selecciona una acción de ataque desde el panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla para atacar a un enemigo y pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre una nave enemiga. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} puedes usar todos los ataques de la nave una vez.
Maniobra tu nave en combate y ataca con las diferentes armas para aprovechar al máximo las capacidades de tu nave.

languages.text:
Wähle im unteren Bildschirmteil eine Angriffsaktion aus, mit der du einen Gegner angreifen willst, und klicke dann mit [LMB] auf das gegnerische Schiff. In jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} kannst du jeden Angriff deines Schiffes einmal einsetzen.
Manövriere dein Schiff im Kampf und greife mit verschiedenen Waffen an, um die Fähigkeiten deines Schiffes optimal auszunutzen.
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
Wähle im unteren Bildschirmteil eine Angriffsaktion aus, mit der du einen Gegner angreifen willst, und klicke dann mit der [LMB] auf das gegnerische Schiff. In jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} kannst du jeden Angriff deines Schiffes einmal einsetzen.
Manövriere dein Schiff im Kampf und greife mit verschiedenen Waffen an, um die Fähigkeiten deines Schiffes optimal auszunutzen.

languages.text:
Sélectionnez une action d'attaque dans le panneau en bas de l'écran, puis cliquez avec le [BGS] sur le vaisseau ennemi. Vous pouvez utiliser chaque attaque du vaisseau une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Au combat, manœuvrez votre vaisseau et attaquez avec différentes armes pour tirer le meilleur parti des capacités de votre appareil.
languages.original_text:
Select an attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen to attack an enemy with, then click [LMB] on the enemy ship. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, you can use each of the ship's attacks once.
Manoeuvre your ship in battle and attack with different weapons to make the most out of your ship's capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
Sélectionnez une action d'attaque dans le panneau en bas de l'écran, puis cliquez avec le [BGS] sur le vaisseau ennemi. Vous pouvez utiliser chaque attaque du vaisseau une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Au combat, manœuvrez votre vaisseau et attaquez avec différentes armes pour tirer le meilleur parti des capacités de votre appareil.

languages.text:
Düşmana saldırmak için ekranın altındaki panelden bir saldırı eylemi seç, ardından düşman gemisine sol fare tuşuyla tıkla. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde, geminin saldırılarından her birini bir kez kullanabilirsin.
Çatışmalarda geminin imkânlarından en iyi şekilde yararlanmak için manevralar yap ve farklı silahlarla saldır.
